name: Jungle Run (memroid)
description:
Jungle Run, Free Action Fantasy Running Game
This is a new thrilling fantasy adventuorous game. Enjoy the adventurous run through the mysterious jungle.

Play the game in various difficulty modes avaialble :
* Beginner Mode
* Intermediate Mode
* Expert Mode

Also you get to select various players you want to play with.
Select the player, Select difficulty mode and get started with the game.

Controls :

* Arrow Left
* Arrow Right
* Jump Button

This is an infinte endless runner game. Get coins as you adavance in the game.
Use coins to purchase extra lifes, power packs and unlock new players.
Each level has some target, cover the specified target for a level to advance to the next levels.

Get past all the hurdles, spiders,dragons,rolling rocks, other monsters on your path ...The path is full of suspense and unlimited action.

Your comments and feedbacks are valuable to us.
